comments.author: Greg
comments.body: I'm in a meeting until noon. I'll be going out for a ride after that. -G

comments.author: Matt
comments.body: Does the hit count include the RSS feed?

comments.author: Steve
comments.body: Matt, we get about 9 requests/day for the FF feed according to Feedburner. I noticed about 7 hits on the website from Florida last month. Wonder who that is?! How's things?
